entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is the father of Dudley and Harry. He is mentioned as being in the kitchen with Aunt Petunia.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is the mother of Dudley and Harry. She is mentioned as being in the kitchen with Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who lives in the house with his family. He is thrown into the hall by Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's brother. He is also thrown into the hall by Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: kitchen door
entities.description: The kitchen door is a location in the house where Uncle Vernon slams it behind Harry and Dudley.

entities.name: hall
entities.description: The hall is a location in the house where Harry and Dudley are thrown by Uncle Vernon.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon throws Harry and Dudley into the hall through the kitchen door.
Harry listens at the keyhole to hear what is being discussed in the kitchen.
Dudley wins the fight with Harry and gets to listen at the keyhole.
Uncle Vernon is speaking to Aunt Petunia in the kitchen.
Harry can see Uncle Vernon's shiny black shoes pacing up and down the kitchen.
